title: Hextech Ward Skin Bug
body: Ok so today i was opening my hextech chest and got the [GINGERBREAD WARD SKIN]  after i had made the ward permanent  i went in game to test it out but the only thing i saw was my [GONG WARD SKIN] so after i finished my game i restarted my client and the ward was still not there can someone help my situation plz .

replies.body:
Hey! 

There is current a bug preventing you from seeing certain ward skins. Don't worry - you still own them! 

In the meantime, we're looking into what's causing this.
thx for the reply but i have one question when u do have it fixed well i be able to get back my ward ?
You should still have all the content you had prior - it's just a visual bug.
same here and the name on the hextech crafting was " **loot_name_ward_skin_rental_7 "
yeah mine had different numbers i think
